text:
This error occurs when you try to re-run the export block, of the transformed green_taxi data to PostgreSQL.
What you’ll need to do is to drop the table using SQL in Mage (screenshot below).
You should be able to re-run the block successfully after dropping the table.
question: UndefinedColumn: column "ratecode_id", "rate_code_id" “vendor_id”, “pu_location_id”, “do_location_id” of relation "green_taxi" does not exist - Export transformed green_taxi data to PostgreSQL
